'''18w07c''' is the twentieth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on February 16, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w07a|February 14, 2018}}</ref>, which updated translations and fixed a few bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Crowdin]]'''
* Updated translations.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w07c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|106387|Lava doesn't decrease SKY light.
|;dev
|125068|Execute if/unless entity lags behind {{cmd|kill}} in same function.
|125400|Bubble columns spawn inconsistently.
|125370|Cocoa beans can't be placed on stripped jungle logs.
|125396|Two high sea grass placed inside ocean monuments overrides parts of the walls.
|;previous
|125474|Opening the creative inventory while the crafting recipe book is enabled causes a crash.
}}</onlyinclude>
